name: Kagsa Library
summary: Learn about .KGL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Kagsa is an interpreted programming language written in Python. Developers can use Kagsa and its compiler to write and execute simple programs.
Developers creating Kagsa programs can compile one or more functions into a Kagsa library. These libraries are saved as KGL archives. Each KGL file always contains the following files:

description: A KGL file is a library used by the Kagsa programming language. It contains one or more common functions developers can call while writing Kagsa source code files (.KG files). KGL files are renamed .ZIP archives that contain .PY files.

instructions: You can open a KGL file with any common archive utility. Before doing so, you may have to rename the file's extension to .zip.
